functionalj.stream.intstream

Interface IntStreamPlusWithSegment

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IntStreamPlus
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayBackedIntStreamPlus, IntStep.IntStepToStream

    public interface IntStreamPlusWithSegment

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IntStreamPlus intStreamPlus() 
      default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segment(int count)
      Segment the stream into sub stream with the fix length of count.
      default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segment(IntUnaryOperator segmentSize)
      Create a stream of sub-stream which size is derived from the value.
      default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentAfter(IntPredicate endCondition)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting the element after the precondition is true.
      default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentBetween(IntPredicate startCondition, IntPredicate endCondition)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
      default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentBetween(IntPredicate startCondition, IntPredicate endCondition, boolean includeIncompletedSegment)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
      default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentBetween(IntPredicate startCondition, IntPredicate endCondition, IncompletedSegment incompletedSegment)
      Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
      default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentWhen(IntPredicate startCondition)
      Segment the stream into sub stream whenever the start condition is true.

    • Method Detail

      • intStreamPlus

        IntStreamPlus intStreamPlus()

      • segment

        default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segment(int count)
        Segment the stream into sub stream with the fix length of count. The last portion may be shorter.

      • segment

        default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segment(IntUnaryOperator segmentSize)
        Create a stream of sub-stream which size is derived from the value. If the segmentSize function return 0, the value will be ignored.

      • segmentWhen

        default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentWhen(IntPredicate startCondition)
        Segment the stream into sub stream whenever the start condition is true. The tail sub stream will always be included.

      • segmentAfter

        default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentAfter(IntPredicate endCondition)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting the element after the precondition is true.

      • segmentBetween

        default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentBetween(IntPredicate startCondition,
                                               IntPredicate endCondition)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively. Note: this method will not include the last sub stream even if the end condition is never been true before the stream ended.
        Parameters:
        startCondition - the condition to start the sub stream
        endCondition - the condition to end the sub stream

      • segmentBetween

        default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentBetween(IntPredicate startCondition,
                                               IntPredicate endCondition,
                                               IncompletedSegment incompletedSegment)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
        Parameters:
        startCondition - the condition to start the sub stream
        endCondition - the condition to end the sub stream
        incompletedSegment - specifying if the incomplete segment at the end should be included.

      • segmentBetween

        default StreamPlus<IntFuncList> segmentBetween(IntPredicate startCondition,
                                               IntPredicate endCondition,
                                               boolean includeIncompletedSegment)
        Segment the stream into sub stream starting when the start condition is true and ending when the end condition is true -- both inclusively.
        Parameters:
        startCondition - the condition to start the sub stream
        endCondition - the condition to end the sub stream
        includeIncompletedSegment - specifying if the incomplete segment at the end should be included.
